gold.user: Retrieve a list of all cable terminations in the system.

gold.ideal: A successful response with the created cable termination details.

gold.ideal: A successful response with a list of cables.

gold.ideal: A successful response confirming the cable has been deleted.

gold.ideal: A successful response with the updated device details.
